title: Revenge
description: ***Bad Boy Royals of Kingsbury Prep Series is loosely based on a true life Prep School only for Royalty. The author, who is also a film producer came across a school in real life for royals with a mystery. Revenge is Book 3 of the Kingsbury Prep Series. ***   The Royals have no say here. This is MY Story.   My name is Tempest Ryan, and I will get my REVENGE.   *Revenge is book 3 of a bully romance and reverse harem book series featuring 3 to 4 royals with our heroine Tempest as she navigates and survives what goes on in and out of Kingsbury Prep. Revenge is mature YA and New Adult and contains language and consensual sex only amongst the older characters. There is redemption and there is humility. This is a work of fiction where the bullying is kept in the books, and Love and treating other humans decently is emphasize for life.
author: Rachel Angel
